about_the_game:
This DLC adds an additional resort location: an idyllic lake and the surrounding forest. This haven of tranquillity is an ideal place to build a hotel for holidaymakers seeking nature and the great outdoors!

It includes:
- 3 lakeside hotel construction locations: Pearrock Bay, Archipelago Beach, and Ample Shoreline
- A large collection of decor items and traditional wood furniture
- New activities such as canoeing and paddleboating
- An exclusive uniform for your staff
